mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Thanks for favor of Dec. 4 with his addresses to the Tammany and Philomenian societies; former has sentiments of republican patriotism which distinguish every branch of Tammany societies and on which depend all the hopes of man for good government.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1812 January 2, Monticello [Albemarle County, Virginia] to John Pitman, Jr., Providence, [Rhode Island].
